|brand = Netgear |model = ReadyNAS |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = RN212 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RN212D22-100 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2976485002 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Annapurna Labs;Alpine AL21400;AL21400-1400; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A15 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz<!-- 1.4 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34MS01G200BHI000; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI NOR |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L512EMI-10G; |flash2size = 64 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G0846D-BYK0; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |eth3chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = A0:04:60
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.10;alpine_db-1.49; |stockos = Linux;4.1.30.alpine.1;;
|exp_if_types = SATA 3.0, USB 3.0 (Type A) |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, JP3 |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, JP5
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = eSATA, RTC w/ battery backup, fan, heatsink, LACP, SNMP |addchip = I2C Real Time Clock;Intersil;ISL12057;;1;,,, 8K I2C Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C64D;;1;,,, 2K I2C Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C16C;;1;,,, PCIe to SATA Controller;Asmedia;ASM1060;;1;,,, 4 Port USB 3.0 Host Controller;EtronTech;EJ188H;;1;,,, Temperature Sensor and Thermal Watchdog;NXP;LM75B;;1;,,, Fan Speed Controller w/Linear or PWM Mode;GMT;G761;;1;,,, 4 Output PCIe Gen 1/2 Synthesizer;Renesas;IDT5V41186;;1;,,, 3.3V Single Port SATA2 i/m ReDriver;Pericom;PI3EQX4951ST;;1;,,, 6A, 18V Synchronous Step-down Converter;MPS;MPQ8632GLE-6;;2;,,, 2A, 1.3Vâ€“6.0V DDR Memory Termination Regulator;MPS;MP20073;;1;,,, 14A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ Eco-Mode Control;TI;TPS53319;;1;,,, 14A, 30V P-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP6679GM;;1;,,, 1.8V CMOS Operational Amplifier;TI;OPA2314;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |manuf = Delta Networks <!-- Aoshikang Technology --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 606449110913 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16822122201 |asin = B015S0Y4YY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"2976485002" is silkscreened on the main board. *"2976492901" is silkscreened on the USB/Network board. *"2976485202" is silkscreened on the SATA board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Annapurna Labs]]'' Alpine AL21400 QuadCore ARM Cortex-A15 (@1.4GHz) *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 512KiB SPI NOR Flash, 128MB SLC NAND Flash, 2x SATA, 1x eSATA *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== [https://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/GPL/ReadyNASOS_V6.9.6_WW_src.zip Latest GPL Source]
